scripts.build: npm run build:plate-validator && npm run build:retrieve-plate && npm run build:plate-preview && npm run build:payment-status-check && npm run build:payment-status-create && npm run build:woovi-pix-invoice && npm run build:woovi-pix-invoice-website && npm run build:woovi-pix-paid-webhook
scripts.build:plate-validator: node -e "import('esbuild').then(e => import('./esbuild-lambda-layer-plugin.mjs').then(p => e.build({ entryPoints: ['./plate_validator/index.ts'], bundle: true, sourcemap: true, minify: true, platform: 'node', target: 'node22', outdir: 'plate_validator/dist', plugins: [p.lambdaLayerPlugin] })))"
scripts.build:retrieve-plate: node -e "import('esbuild').then(e => import('./esbuild-lambda-layer-plugin.mjs').then(p => e.build({ entryPoints: ['./retrieve_plate/index.ts'], bundle: true, sourcemap: true, minify: true, platform: 'node', target: 'node22', outdir: 'retrieve_plate/dist', external: ['mongoose'], plugins: [p.lambdaLayerPlugin] })))"
scripts.build:plate-preview: node -e "import('esbuild').then(e => import('./esbuild-lambda-layer-plugin.mjs').then(p => e.build({ entryPoints: ['./plate_preview/index.ts'], bundle: true, sourcemap: true, minify: true, platform: 'node', target: 'node22', outdir: 'plate_preview/dist', external: ['mongoose'], plugins: [p.lambdaLayerPlugin] })))"
scripts.build:payment-status-check: node -e "import('esbuild').then(e => import('./esbuild-lambda-layer-plugin.mjs').then(p => e.build({ entryPoints: ['./payment_status_check/index.ts'], bundle: true, sourcemap: true, minify: true, platform: 'node', target: 'node22', outdir: 'payment_status_check/dist', external: ['mongoose'], plugins: [p.lambdaLayerPlugin] })))"
scripts.build:payment-status-create: node -e "import('esbuild').then(e => import('./esbuild-lambda-layer-plugin.mjs').then(p => e.build({ entryPoints: ['./payment_status_create/index.ts'], bundle: true, sourcemap: true, minify: true, platform: 'node', target: 'node22', outdir: 'payment_status_create/dist', external: ['mongoose'], plugins: [p.lambdaLayerPlugin] })))" && cp -r payment_status_create/sources payment_status_create/dist/sources
scripts.build:woovi-pix-invoice: node -e "import('esbuild').then(e => import('./esbuild-lambda-layer-plugin.mjs').then(p => e.build({ entryPoints: ['./woovi_pix_invoice/index.ts'], bundle: true, sourcemap: true, minify: true, platform: 'node', target: 'node22', outdir: 'woovi_pix_invoice/dist', plugins: [p.lambdaLayerPlugin] })))"
scripts.build:woovi-pix-invoice-website: node -e "import('esbuild').then(e => import('./esbuild-lambda-layer-plugin.mjs').then(p => e.build({ entryPoints: ['./woovi_pix_invoice_website/index.ts'], bundle: true, sourcemap: true, minify: true, platform: 'node', target: 'node22', outdir: 'woovi_pix_invoice_website/dist', plugins: [p.lambdaLayerPlugin] })))"
scripts.build:woovi-pix-paid-webhook: node -e "import('esbuild').then(e => import('./esbuild-lambda-layer-plugin.mjs').then(p => e.build({ entryPoints: ['./woovi_pix_paid_webhook/index.ts'], bundle: true, sourcemap: true, minify: true, platform: 'node', target: 'node22', outdir: 'woovi_pix_paid_webhook/dist', external: ['mongoose'], plugins: [p.lambdaLayerPlugin] })))"
